heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly cloudy. Areas of freezing fog. Snow in the mountains and in the St. Lawrence Valley, with another 1 to 3 inches; chance of snow or rain showers in the valleys from the Champlain and Hudson valleys eastward, with a trace to an inch. Temperatures falling into the 20s east of the Greens, falling through the 20s west, except teens in the Adirondacks and St. Lawrence Valley. Winds from the west to northwest at 5 to 15 mph, or becoming so.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy. Chance of a snow shower in southern valleys; otherwise scattered snow showers, mainly from the northern Greens eastward, with another trace to 2 inches. Lows from zero to 10 above in the north, low to mid teens in the south. West winds 5 to 15 mph.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly to partly cloudy. Scattered morning snow showers northeast. Valley highs from the upper teens to mid 20s south and in the Champlain Valley, mid teens to around 20 elsewhere north. West to southwest winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph.
